Summary: Oval disk 30 to 35 ft, sice I have been 5 yrs old, bad dreams and repeated sightings, tired of it
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Wixom
There were no other sightings in Wixom on or around July 20th 1969
divs: Sighting DetailsMoved in from the South west, all I can say is that it was super sonic in speed, stopped very quickly, hovered with different lights pulsating then a imense displaym of gold and white light came on and it just moved a few meters and vanished into thin air??
